title: Ticket #2191: Startd can get stuck reporting Benchmarking activity
description: If the startd fails to launch the benchmarking programs (if, for example, the path to them is misconfigured in the config file), the startd can end up incorrectly reporting the last slot as in activity Benchmarking when it should be reported as Idle.
